income_messages:
From: s**********0@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-02-20 22:41:56
SUBJECT: It is good writing you today a
It is good writing you today although we haven't known nor met each
other before. It is true that this letter may come to you as a
surprise. Nevertheless I humbly ask you to give me the benefit of
doubt and hear me out. My name is Mrs Selina Mawa married to Mr.Tyler
We were married for 12 years without a child. My husband died after a
brief illness that lasted for only four days. Since his death I
decided not to remarry due to my religious belief. When my late
husband was alive he deposited the sum of US$3.700,000 in a Bank here
in this country. Recently my Doctor told me that I would not last for
the next Two months due to cancer illness. I decided to donate this
fund to Worked of God, organization or good person that will use this
money to help the less privileged in the society. Contact me
immediately for more details. Please do remember me in your daily
prayer. Yours sincerely,
Mrs.Selina Mawa.
From: s**********0@gmail.com
To: x*****1@mail.wltechinc.top
Time: 2023-02-21 19:40:50
SUBJECT: Re: It is good writing you today a
In response to your email I have been suffering from cancer illness
for so many years now and I have visited a lots of hospitals in so
many countries still there is no solution for the problem then my
Doctor told me that I would not last for the next Two months due to
the seriousness of the case I am very confused and don't know what to
do that is why I decided to contact you for you to use this Money to
help the less privileged in the society  I’ am equally glad that when
this money will be transferred to you that you are going to work
according to my wishes and instructions to help work of God and less
privileged in the society. then open a very good Charity Foundation
that will bear my names even if I pass away, my names will not pass
away. Through that you will be remembering someone like me on this
earth.
I have planned to Ship this fund through a good friend of mine whom I
believe in all things but unfortunately this friend of mine died in an
auto crash. May his soul rest in perfect peace, Amen. This is the
reason why I now invite you to be my overseas partner. I hope that you
are going to maintain the trust I have with you that you are not going
to betray me when the money is transferred to you. Please I want you
to send me the following information of yours, so that Reverend sister
Anne Kennedy. Who is helping me in this hospital will proceed to file
an official application letter to the headquarter of the deposited
Bank where my late husband made the deposit so that they will
recognize your status as my appointed beneficiary.
a) Full name..........................................
b) Address.............................................
c) Your private phone number..................
d) Occupation.......................................
e) Age..................................................
The official application which Reverend sister Anne Kennedy. Will file
on your behalf will officially and legally approve you as the
appointed beneficiary to this my inheritance funds. So that these
funds will be transferred to any of your designated bank accounts. As
soon as I hear from you I shall let you have the contact of the Bank
so that you shall officially email and apply for the claim on my
behalf. please continue to remember me in your daily prayer.
Waiting for your response as soon as possible.
Mrs.Selina Mawa.
From: s**********0@gmail.com
To: x*****1@mail.wltechinc.top
Time: 2023-02-21 20:19:57
SUBJECT: Re: It is good writing you today a
Please I want you to send me the following information of yours, so that
Reverend sister Anne Kennedy. Who is helping me in this hospital will
proceed to file an official application letter to the headquarter of the
deposited Bank where my late husband made the deposit so that they will
recognize your status as my appointed beneficiary.
a) Full name..........................................
b) Address.............................................
c) Your private phone number..................
d) Occupation.......................................
e) Age..................................................
 The attachment is my picture on my sickbed, please continue to remember me
in your daily prayer.
Waiting for your response as soon as possible.
Mrs.Selina Mawa.

Ninfa

Ninfa
